title: Primitives: number, string, boolean, null, undefined, symbol, bigint
description: Understanding JavaScript's 7 primitive data types and how they work. Learn about immutability, type checking, and common pitfalls.

title: Type Coercion: Implicit vs Explicit
description: Master JavaScript's type coercion rules including == vs ===, truthy/falsy values, and how to avoid common pitfalls.

title: Variable Declarations: var, let, const
description: Understand scoping differences between var (function scope), let (block scope), and const (immutability). Learn when to use each.

title: Hoisting: How JavaScript Moves Declarations
description: Learn how JavaScript hoists variable and function declarations, and why you see undefined or ReferenceError in certain situations.

title: Closures: Capturing Scope
description: Master closures - functions that retain access to their outer scope. Essential for callbacks, data privacy, and function factories.

title: This Binding: Context and Methods
description: Understand how 'this' is bound in different contexts: functions, methods, arrow functions, call/apply/bind, and constructors.

title: Prototypes and Prototype Chain
description: Learn JavaScript's prototype-based inheritance, the prototype chain, and how to use Object.create, constructors, and prototypal patterns.

title: ES6 Classes: Syntax Sugar over Prototypes
description: Understand ES6 class syntax, constructors, inheritance with extends, static methods, and getters/setters.

title: Callbacks: Functions as Arguments
description: Learn callback functions, callback hell, and why callbacks matter for asynchronous operations in JavaScript.

title: Promises: Handling Async Operations
description: Master promises - pending, fulfilled, rejected states, chaining, .catch(), .finally(), and Promise utility methods.

title: Async/Await: Modern Async Syntax
description: Learn async functions and await keywords for clean, synchronous-looking asynchronous code. Master error handling with try/catch.

title: Event Loop: Call Stack, Queue, and Microtasks
description: Understand JavaScript's single-threaded execution model, call stack, callback queue, microtask queue, and event loop mechanics.

title: Higher-Order Functions: Functions that Operate on Functions
description: Learn functions that accept functions as arguments or return functions. Master map, filter, reduce, and function composition.

title: Arrow Functions: Concise Syntax and Lexical This
description: Master arrow function syntax, implicit returns, and lexical this binding. Learn when to use arrows vs regular functions.

title: Destructuring: Arrays and Objects
description: Learn array and object destructuring, nested destructuring, default values, and renaming in modern JavaScript.

title: Spread and Rest: ... Operator
description: Master spread operator for arrays/objects and rest parameters. Learn use cases in function calls, array literals, and function parameters.

title: Template Literals: Backticks and Interpolation
description: Learn template literals with ${} interpolation, multi-line strings, and tagged template literals.

title: Error Handling: try/catch/finally and Error Types
description: Learn try/catch/finally blocks, error types (SyntaxError, TypeError, etc.), custom errors, and error propagation.

title: Regular Expressions: Pattern Matching
description: Master regex syntax, character classes, quantifiers, groups, capturing, lookahead/lookbehind, and regex methods.

title: Modules: ES6 Import/Export and CommonJS
description: Learn ES6 modules (import/export), CommonJS (require/module.exports), named vs default exports, and circular dependencies.
